testSteps.description: Given a payment request of amount "10.000" is received via messaging services
When the payment details are inserted in the database
Then success message and response is received
Then payment details are inserted in the database
When the systemA is queried for the debitor account status and available balance
Then success response is received for account with active status
And success response for balance query is received when the account balance is greater than the transaction amount
When systemA is queried for creditor account
Then success message is received for creditor account with active status
When payment request is send to systemB
Then the account balance is updated for debitor account
And confirmation message is received from systemB
When payment request is send to systemB
Then the account balance is updated for creditor account
And confirmation message is received from systemB
When the payment status is update fails in the database
